name: Scinapsis Analytics Inc
description: Developer of a research intelligence platform designed to accelerate biomedical discoveries. The company's platform uses machine learning and artificial intelligence to translate both closed and open-access data into recommendations for specific experiments regarding antibody extraction, enabling researchers and scientists to run successful experiments in less time without wasting resources.
